title: Chinese sex doll maker sees jump in 2025 sales as AI improves user experience
author: Coco Feng
description: WMDoll founder Liu Jiangxia says the integration of generative AI models ‘makes the dolls more responsive and interactive’.
tags: large language model, data centres, Meta Platforms, Llama, open source, MetaBox series, Europe, Italy, United States, Baidu , iFlyTek, Mind with Heart Robotics, start-up, Zhongshan, Guangdong, Meta Platform, privacy concerns, DeepSeek, Liu Jiangxia, artificial intelligence, sex doll industry, WMDoll, ChatGPT, OpenAI, North America, Shenzhen, Starpery Technology
cntitle: 随着人工智能改善用户体验，中国性爱娃娃制造商预计 2025 年销量将出现增长
cndescription: WMDoll 创始人 Liu Jiangxia 表示，生成式 AI 模型的集成“使娃娃更具响应性和互动性”。
